trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed removal of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A javasolt eltávolításának jelöli egy <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> a egy <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> belül futó munkafolyamat-példányhoz.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the index of the activity being removed when you remove the activity using the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy a tevékenység a tevékenység a munkafolyamat-módosítások eltávolításakor törlődnek az index.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which the activity was removed.
trans-unit.target: A gyökértevékenység, ahonnan a tevékenységet el lett távolítva.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.
The instance of the original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.

Gets index of the removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> collection of the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az eltávolított lekérdezi indexe <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> rendelkező a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>gyűjtemény a szülő <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.
